name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: I hope people realize I am kind by choice. Some people don’t have a mean bone in their body. I am not one of those people. Every bone in my body is mean. That’s what makes them effective at protecting my heart.
content.value:
I hope people realize I am kind by choice.

Some people don’t have a mean bone in their body. I am not one of those people. Every bone in my body is mean. 

That’s what makes them effective at protecting my heart.
